meanings.definition: Having a keel or ridge along the center, as in a carinated shell.
meanings.sent1: The carinated shell had a distinct ridge running along its center.
meanings.sent2: The boat's carinated shape helped it cut through the water smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The carinated edge of the plate made it easier to hold without slipping.
meanings.sent4: Her carinated hairband added a unique touch to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The carinated design of the building's roof made it stand out in the city skyline.

meanings.definition: Shaped like a keel, as in a carinated boat.
meanings.sent1: The carinated boat glided gracefully across the lake.
meanings.sent2: The carinated hull of the ship helped it navigate rough waters.
meanings.sent3: The carinated boat looked like a sleek arrow cutting through the waves.
meanings.sent4: His carinated surfboard allowed him to ride the waves with ease.
meanings.sent5: The carinated outline of the vessel gave it a futuristic appearance.

meanings.definition: Having a raised ridge or edge, as in a carinated edge.
meanings.sent1: The carinated edge of the table prevented items from sliding off.
meanings.sent2: The carinated rim of the bowl added a decorative touch to the table setting.
meanings.sent3: The carinated edge of the bookshelf kept the books neatly in place.
meanings.sent4: Her carinated bracelet caught the light and sparkled beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The carinated pattern on the fabric gave it a textured feel.
